DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized , double-blind placebo-controlled trial 6 month ' duration evaluate effect fenofibrate ( 200 mg/day ) females polycystic ovary syndrome mild hypertriglyceridemia . The investigator primary objective determine whether fenofibrate reduce hepatic adiposity measure use MRI , secondary outcome delineate impact fenofibrate biochemical clinical parameter insulin resistance , cardiovascular disease , reproductive status .
